website_summaries.verdict: Visually organizes daily schedule so students know what to expect, which can help with cooperation.
pros: Long rectangular organizer with 13 pockets listing subjects and times
Time cards are cardboard with dry erase coating
Includes blank subject cards for customization
Pocket at bottom holds spare cards
Hangs with grommets and over-the-door hooks
cons: Plastic pockets may not fully cover all cards, which can lead to smudges

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Great for our daily schedule! Big enough and long enough for many tasks. I just got online and found visual schedule slips, printed and cut pout what we needed and it works great.
customer_reviews.author: Reader12

customer_reviews.title: Works great for home schedules also!
customer_reviews.text: I’m not a teacher, but I have three littles home for the summer. Kids thrive on having a set schedule, so I thought this would be a perfect way to keep a schedule up where they can always see it. It’s exactly what I needed. I can write my own things on the cards, and easily wipe them off whenever I need to change something. The only thing I would change is to have the pockets a little deeper, but it still works just fine.
customer_reviews.author: Kaysa

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Fast shipping, great price. Great for our homeschool room. LOVE the !two sided! write-on/wipe-off colorful time cards that allow me to write in our own activities. Lots of extra blank cards as well. Nice storage pocket at the bottom to hold extra cards and a marker. It would have been even better with three or four more clear pockets to accommodate more half hour events but it's not a deal breaker. I just doubled up on the activity card to fit everything in. Love that it hangs over a door instead of nailing or thumb tacking into a wall. Very pleased!
customer_reviews.author: Leslie Merrell

customer_reviews.title: Best thing for staying sane as a parent
customer_reviews.text: I’m a stay at home mom with a 3 and 5 year old. I wanted to stay organized this summer and get my girls on a schedule so they wouldn’t fight me on doing chores or whatever this summer. I made a bunch of my own additional items and laminated them. Three weeks in and my girls love it. They love waking up each day and knowing what the schedule will be. Plus it has helped keep me organized and motivated for the next projects with the kids. I highly recommend this!
customer_reviews.author: Diane S.

customer_reviews.title: Very helpful to homeschool kids
customer_reviews.text: Great for home school kids, sturdy and clear. With hooks to hang. With some spare blank signs. Love it. Great quality! It will be perfect if provide more signs with various content such as nap time, dance. Outdoor. Play puzzle or card or play Games. The content focus on preschool activities but can be more broad.
customer_reviews.author: D. G

customer_reviews.title: A Must-Have for Teachers!
customer_reviews.text: I used this chart to display each day's schedule for my fourth-grade class. We were an inclusive classroom, so I had multiple students who are differently-abled and required an advanced notice of the day's schedule. The chart is durable, the cards held up, and it looked bright and cheery hanging on my wall. I do which that there was a strip for Language Arts. However, I am incredibly pleased with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Chicken Mommy

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Using this to help my daughter keep track of her daily remote learning schedule. Works great and has the perfect amount of pockets for all her synchronous and asynchronous periods and breaks. Also has a great variety of subjects that accords with her curriculum. I also really like the ability to put in the time using the standard clock, as it gives my child another opportunity to learn how to tell time and coordinate the time with the wall clock.
customer_reviews.author: JHanlon

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointing! The font is not standard.
customer_reviews.text: This was very disappointing and I will be returning it. The lettering is not appropriate for school-age children because it is not standard lettering. The extra strips are not imprinted with the time and a clock. They are just blank.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah D.

customer_reviews.title: Great tool, smaller than expected
customer_reviews.text: It's fantastic and it's doing its job very well. It. Comes with several blank cards to fill in with any subject that's not included in the pre made ones. Thing is that it loses its asethetic when you do. It would be nice to have more options, such as 2nd languages, or an actual Language Arts one instead of reading and writing (no, kids. We're not going to have reading time. It's language arts time!) it's also a bit smaller than I expected. I thought it would be about the size of a door but it's about the size of a medium sized locker. It's still good and works fantastic
customer_reviews.author: Diego Aldape

customer_reviews.title: Great for a classroom
customer_reviews.text: For a classroom, this is perfect. You can write on it with a whiteboard marker, and it is a very good visual for kids of all ages. It’s very durable too. For at home, it doesn’t fit for home needs. The nice part is it does come with a lot of blank strips that you can write on for home, but then you don’t have the visual picture for it. So I wouldn’t recommend using it for home.
customer_reviews.author: a

customer_reviews.title: Softball
customer_reviews.text: I actually purchased this for my softball team. It is working great for the lineup and field positions. The kids don't need to keep asking where they are playing or when they are batting. I used the blank cards that came with this and laminated the field positions. I used adhesive to put the kid's names on the rest of the cards without laminating so I can reuse for next season. The clips don't hold to well on fences so I replaced with other clips. It is working great!!
customer_reviews.author: Erika

customer_reviews.title: Poor Design
customer_reviews.text: Poorly made in my opinion. I was expecting it to be larger and I expected the times to be printed on the cards. I constantly have to re-write the times on the dry erase sheets if the children so much as graze them. It is very difficult to create an inclusive activity with the kids, allowing them to participate. The children in my classroom became so frustrated with it that we had to print our own time cards and the only reason we still have the chart is for the pockets
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Hay

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: While the concept is great, I am a bit disappointed. Mine did not arrive with labels for “Morning” and “Gym” as indicated in the picture. Also, there is one recess label - we have 2. I expected a header label indicating “Daily Schedule.” Also, not included. I bought this to save valuable time at this crazy time of the school year. I have had to create and laminate many labels that I feel should have been included.
customer_reviews.author: hoop671

customer_reviews.title: Great for schooling at home...
customer_reviews.text: Helps my kids feel like they have a schedule, and that they're in a "classroom", even if it's in our kitchen or dining room. Lots of great pre-made topics, but they also give you a fair amount of blank ones so that you can create your own. Easy to use and change, and easy to clean!
customer_reviews.author: misasha23

customer_reviews.title: Happy with purchase
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for us doing distant learning for my first grader. I like that it came with reversible and blank cards so I can swap out. My daughter goes physically to school 3 days a week for a couple hours so each day I can swap out the schedule for her and my Aunt who is the one helping her with online school while my husband and I are at work. Happy with purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Cristina McCoy

customer_reviews.title: Great for home learning..
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I ordered! Easy to use and it’s great for my daughter who is doing her remote learning. It helps with her routine and structure. She’s a very visible child so this schedule is perfect for her daily schedule which changes from day to day.
customer_reviews.author: SR

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use, my third graders love updating the schedule themselves - flexible, comes with preprinted cards or you can customize - fits in a narrow space - nice storage pocket at bottom for extra cards, marker and eraser - fast to ship.
customer_reviews.author: fun

customer_reviews.title: Large, nice visual schedule for at home schooling
customer_reviews.text: Nice and large! Sturdy material. Doing online school due to Covid and wanted an easy daily schedule for my kids to look at. Comes with pre-printed cards or blank ones. I used a dry erase marker so I can easily change it up.
customer_reviews.author: IMNRN

customer_reviews.title: Plastic sleeve is different than advertised
customer_reviews.text: The plastic is not true to discription. I ordered this according to the picture and past reviews, but once my order came, mine is different. The plastic does not fully cover the papers as the advertizement pictures show.
customer_reviews.author: Virginia

customer_reviews.title: the plastic does not fully cover the card
customer_reviews.text: The plastic cover only goes up half way, and so the card is sticking out half way. Also, the plastic over will wipe away some of the dry erase market on the card. The sizing doesn't work well if you want to use it for a vocabulary chart. This item is a good idea but the design is just poor.
customer_reviews.author: d

customer_reviews.title: No
customer_reviews.text: This is not big enough. The slots panels: card things are too small. They can’t be seen from far away. There should also be other categories...I’m not pleased at all.
customer_reviews.author: Karina

customer_reviews.title: Practical for
customer_reviews.text: This schedule chart would would have been better if it has more shelves to put more labels. Nevertheless the quality is good and it has several extra sheets to write on your schedule.
customer_reviews.author: YoursD

customer_reviews.title: Amazing quality! You can't beat the price!
customer_reviews.text: Wow! Let me tell you, this chart is amazing quality. The note cards are thick not flimsy. The chart is extremely durable. I am so surprised how nice this product is. For only 13 bucks! I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Casandra

customer_reviews.title: Great product at a great price
customer_reviews.text: It is sturdy and hangs nicely on the door. The cards fit well into the pouches without smearing the marker. The pocket at the bottom is perfect for holding the extras.
customer_reviews.author: zakoka

customer_reviews.title: Schedule
customer_reviews.text: It seems durable, I don't know because I will not use it. I purchased mainly to replace an old set that didn't have any pics associated with the scheduled activities and this one had very few.
customer_reviews.author: Regina

customer_reviews.title: Otherwise good quality and my kids have enjoyed using it
customer_reviews.text: I wish the blank ones had clocks on them to match the set up of the others. And one that said social studies instead of history as it's social studies that's taught in elementary. Otherwise good quality and my kids have enjoyed using it.
customer_reviews.author: Kristina Oneill

customer_reviews.title: Great Product, Worth the price!
customer_reviews.text: This product is good quality and on the reverse side of the premade cards they have empty clocks and you can easily make your own activities and draw times. They also send you completely blank cards which is also great because you could put whatever you want on them without the clock.
customer_reviews.author: ellensmellen

customer_reviews.title: Great for elearning
customer_reviews.text: We love this for elearning. It makes it very clear who should be in which class when. Color coding makes it easy for my kindergartener to follow

customer_reviews.title: Perfect during COVID-19 distance learning
customer_reviews.text: With distance learning starting again for my 8 yr old I needed something to establish a little more school like structure. This is prefect! When I put it up m my son actually told me it's the same thing they had in class. I like that I can write in my own or use the subjects provided.
customer_reviews.author: mckayla s.

customer_reviews.title: I love it
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Definitely easy to use. I purchased an expo dry erase pen set to write the time with activity. I will admit it is smaller than expected but I was expecting it to go all the way to the bottom of the floor . Lol I will admit that much space is not necessary. It hangs about halfway down the door. Again I wish I knew how to take pictures. Definitely gets the job done I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Kayy Banks

customer_reviews.title: A Nice Schedule Chart!
customer_reviews.text: This looks cute in my classroom, and it’s easy for the kids to see the schedule. I like the blank cards, so I can write in my own things! Great chart!
customer_reviews.author: FriendOfGod

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT FOR TBALL
customer_reviews.text: WE USE TO ORGANIZE OURSELVES FOR TBALL. LOVE IT! WE USE IT WITH THE KIDS NAME FOR THE LINEUP. HELPS TO GET ORGANIZE ON WHAT PLAYERS IS NEXT TO BAT.
customer_reviews.author: Cesson

customer_reviews.title: Great Schedule Chart
customer_reviews.text: This is a heavy duty pocket chart and includes scheduling cards. Only thing that would have made it better is if it were magnetic. I do highly recommend it, though.
customer_reviews.author: T. Fisher

customer_reviews.title: Goof
customer_reviews.text: This was Are just as a gift for a teacher. It looks like it will be great but we will see how well it holds up to a roomful of kindergartners. So far so good.
customer_reviews.author: JenMarie28

customer_reviews.title: Smaller than expected but still good!
customer_reviews.text: Great for helping with homeschooling! Gets us through the day with much more ease to be able to see what's left!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Hangs on anydoor
customer_reviews.text: Works great for kids they love it my girls are home schooled we enjoy feeling like were in a real school
customer_reviews.author: Anpao

customer_reviews.title: Not quite right.
customer_reviews.text: It’s very small and so the kids can’t really see it. I kept it, but I wish I had sent it back and purchased something easier to see.
customer_reviews.author: John 3:16

customer_reviews.title: Durable!
customer_reviews.text: It is super durable and built well. I like the setup of the schedule and the ability to make my own “labels” for some of the time slots.
customer_reviews.author: Queenbri2828

customer_reviews.title: Highly Recommend
customer_reviews.text: I was very happy with this purchase! It came packaged nicely, so nothing was bent or damanged. I dont need to have the cards laminated. It's exactly what I needed for my classroom.
customer_reviews.author: got3babies12

customer_reviews.title: Great student visual.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great item for my students that want to know what is coming up next. Also, it is easy to use for second graders and they can move around the times themselves.
customer_reviews.author: Breanne (real btw)

customer_reviews.title: The black material seems sturdy enough and I was able to hang it
customer_reviews.text: The black material seems sturdy enough and I was able to hang it. However, the plastic pockets started to sag in the middle within a week of use, and I did not change out the contents of the pocket chart. This does not happen with other pocket charts I own.
customer_reviews.author: A. Ortiz

customer_reviews.title: Loved!!
customer_reviews.text: This made transitioning from school to home school through the pandemic a lot better for my special needs son and 1st graded! Both their teachers use these in class so it gave them the visual prompts they needed;-)
customer_reviews.author: krystal

customer_reviews.title: Perfect schedule chart
customer_reviews.text: My students had been complaining about not knowing what we were doing. I had ordered and was waiting for it to arrive. Pocket at bottom holds the extras. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Terry Ann Whitby

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I love that this is black. It looks great in my classroom and is perfect for our schedule.
customer_reviews.author: Melinda Turner

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again!! Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.text: I love this pocket chart. Easy to use, convenient, comes with plenty of schedule cards (including some with subjects and some blank to write your own). I love the pockets to hold each card. They’re a good size and the cards never fall out. The big pocket at the bottom is nice for the extra cards/ones I’m not using that day. Altogether a great product for a good price. I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A MUST buy for virtual learning
customer_reviews.text: Love this item. It has blank ones too so you can customize it to exactly what you want.
customer_reviews.author: J. Beard

customer_reviews.title: Did not receive entire set
customer_reviews.text: I like the quality of the cards, but didn't receive a complete set. I teach in Korea, so returning the item isn't easy. I'll probably use the chart and make my own cards. What I received was of good quality, I just wish all of the pieces had been included.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Schedule for my kids
customer_reviews.text: I love it! I just think it is a wonderful and let them know what to do next and help them to remind them do their chores. It is nice and simple!
customer_reviews.author: Danika

customer_reviews.title: Great for any classroom
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this for the up coming school year to help keep the kids on track with their studies.
customer_reviews.author: Danidactyl

customer_reviews.title: Pocket Chart
customer_reviews.text: Nice pocket chart to display a daily schedule. Easy to use and change.
customer_reviews.author: Sheila

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for our virtual home school classroom. My son is in 2nd grade, on an IEP, and this is huge is both helping him stay on topic and transitioning. Highly recommend-well worth the investment!
customer_reviews.author: S Family

customer_reviews.title: Aspiring teacher
customer_reviews.text: My 8 year old wanted this for her birthday, she plays school nearly every day. This was seriously her favorite present.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: awesome purchase
customer_reviews.text: awesome for teaching young children how to schedual events for the day
customer_reviews.author: Tara Stearns

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy
customer_reviews.text: There was not a lunch card or computer lab. There were a lot of blank cards.
customer_reviews.author: Chipii

customer_reviews.title: Works for Older or Younger Children
customer_reviews.text: I love this pocket chart. However, there was not a card for breakfast, which was kind disappointing. Other than that, it’s perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Kenya Henderson

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Use everyday and it's great, as advertised, and I would buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Todd Tucker

customer_reviews.title: Picture misleading
customer_reviews.text: The material would have been a 5 star for sturdy but the plastic sleeve only is about 1inch deep and only covers half the card . The picture shows a full sleeve covering each card. With the cards being half exposed they will not last .
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: BEST SCHEDULE / TEACHING TIME TOOL!
customer_reviews.text: Love this product! It’s perfect for my classroom!i hard laminated the cards for added durability. I use dry erase markers to mark the times. My students enjoy using it as well. Great tool for teaching sequencing and time, and it keeps me on track with my daily schedule! I highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Dupree

customer_reviews.title: Works for me
customer_reviews.text: I love it. I hang it up with velcro because the hooks are useless to me. I laminated the white inserts and write on them with permanent marker. It's very handy and perfect size for my board.
customer_reviews.author: Jessie

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use, hangs right on the door and good quality materials
customer_reviews.author: Nikkirenee

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: It shipped on time and was received on time, upon opening it, everything was as expected. Will probably still laminate to increase durability, but it isn't necessary as it is a good quality item.
customer_reviews.author: erin

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: This will be used in a classroom overseas. I opened it so it could be repacked to go in suitcase. This is made of durable material that will be able to be wiped clean when necessary.
customer_reviews.author: Carol S

customer_reviews.title: Love that some labels were already made and love the ...
customer_reviews.text: Love that some labels were already made and love the option of blank labels so I can create my own. Will look great in my classroom.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect daily schedule!
customer_reviews.text: Product was exactly as described. It was perfect for my classroom makeover. Comes with paper clocks and pictures to fill in so your daily schedule can be seen for younger and older children in 2 ways. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Jillian Onorevole

customer_reviews.title: Margaritas anyone?
customer_reviews.text: Not sure why recess has a photo of a margarita on it... when this is intended for children. However other than that, decent buy.
customer_reviews.author: Carol Rosado

customer_reviews.title: Misleading review
customer_reviews.text: After seeing a video review , I thought this would be perfect for what I needed. In the video she says the slots are big and cover all the inserts , they don’t. They are small and the cards fall out very easily. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Simple and Nice
customer_reviews.text: I love this product! Makes it nice to write stuff and be able to take it off! You can also write the hand time too which is neat!! Not crazy about the hooks that came with it so I didn’t use them but, instead used tacs to hang it up!!
customer_reviews.author: Tabitha Tyler

customer_reviews.title: Great schedule helper
customer_reviews.text: Great to show a schedule for school! Could use some more pre-printed signs like for libaray time or lunch time etc but great item
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good tool, customizable too
customer_reviews.text: I wish the cards included had icons/images to choose from but I have just started to make my own. The calendar holder part itself is still really useful and this has been well received.
customer_reviews.author: Knickerbocker

customer_reviews.title: Came burnt with a hole in it
customer_reviews.text: This item came with bald up plastic wrap with weird specs on it and the item outside of it. I open the item and it have 2 burn cigarette holes on it and it doesn't have the cards or anything that suppose to come with it. My project for school was due tomorrow and I don't have anything to present because of this. HIGHLY DISAPPOINTED Could have atlas put the item in the packaging but instead they put the raggedy packaging inside after placing the item in the sealed envelope. Someone needs to be fired behind this
customer_reviews.author: Shanae  M

customer_reviews.title: I think she will love it and will use it a lot
customer_reviews.text: This is a gift for my niece you just graduated with her Masters in Elementary Ed. I think she will love it and will use it a lot.
customer_reviews.author: grams

customer_reviews.title: Saves space
customer_reviews.text: Saves room on my board instead of handwriting the schedule out.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I like the pocket chart itself
customer_reviews.text: I like the pocket chart itself, but the schedule cards are small. I could barely see the schedule myself when I hung it up in front of the class. I will use the pocket chart for centers and make new cards.
customer_reviews.author: SPPP

customer_reviews.title: Multiple Use Chart
customer_reviews.text: I have had this product since August. I have no complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Cat

customer_reviews.title: Favorite
customer_reviews.text: My favorite thing I order for virtual schooling. Helps my whole family know what is next and it looks nice
customer_reviews.author: LL

customer_reviews.title: Excellent!
customer_reviews.text: Looks great in the classroom - lots of color! Love the extra cards, I can customize.
customer_reviews.author: Margaret Yates

customer_reviews.title: Good set
customer_reviews.text: Didn't like the cards given but it was easy to make new ones, set was definitely worth it
customer_reviews.author: Rose

customer_reviews.title: Misleading pictures and distribution from seller
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because of the pictures and description provided by the seller. They claimed that it had "13 x-large pockets with a full size pocket film." I got half pockets.
customer_reviews.author: BlessRob88

customer_reviews.title: Highly quality
customer_reviews.text: Love this for my classroom. Helps me keep my schedule posted and organized for my students. It’s very easy to use and durable so I am able to have my students adjust the schedule for The next day as a classroom job.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon

customer_reviews.title: Smaller than expected
customer_reviews.text: I didn't look closely at the size of this. I thought it would be bigger since it hangs on a door. Still a great product just smaller than I wanted. Nice, durable and it came with the hooks to hang on the door.
customer_reviews.author: James K Libby

customer_reviews.title: Pocket chart
customer_reviews.text: I am a preschool teacher I love the pocket chart. I actually bought different cards that are preschool appropriate. However, blank cards are included and I could have created my own. The chart is just the right size, not too big or small. My students like it.
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: As expected
customer_reviews.text: It's perfect for the classroom. Withstands kids poking at it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to read and follow pocket chart
customer_reviews.text: I finally set up the pocket chart in the classroom and it's made of quality material, bright and bold headings and easy for preschoolers to look and learn everything during the morning circle. Thank you:).
customer_reviews.author: Leialoha K.

customer_reviews.title: Daily Schedule
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Hanging on my wall and waiting to be used. It is very durable, and came with hooks.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Roberts

customer_reviews.title: good product.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for summer home school with my kids but had to return it because some plastic pocket didn't look good.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Works well!
customer_reviews.text: I love this item. Works well in my classroom. Great build quality.
customer_reviews.author: Ben Swenson

customer_reviews.title: Thick, durable, bright cards
customer_reviews.text: The colors on the cards are vibrant so kids can see them from various places in the classroom. The cards are thick and durable so I won’t have to laminate them again. It is a good st to replace the one I have been using for 20 years.
customer_reviews.author: Sharrie L Lommen

customer_reviews.title: Students love it
customer_reviews.text: My students love changing it and knowing what we have each day
customer_reviews.author: rchen

customer_reviews.title: Pocket Chart
customer_reviews.text: I would recommend if you are putting it in a classroom to laminate the cards just to keep them safe. It makes my room look colorful.
customer_reviews.author: Holly Garrison

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: This was exactly what I needed to display my daily schedule for my kinders. It is easy for them to see/read what we have up for the day, as well as for any substitutes to view easily.
customer_reviews.author: M. Walker

customer_reviews.title: Homeschool Mom
customer_reviews.text: Love it!! ( The only thing I would have preferred is that the additional blanks at least have the space for time and clock already on them). But overall it was exactly what I was looking for. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Very satisfied. Thank u
customer_reviews.text: Got this for granddaughter who was diagonoised with mild Autism. Mom said it’s helpful and working well for her daughter. . Very satisfied. Thank u.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I like the large and colorful pockets
customer_reviews.text: I am positive this will help me and my students when organizing our daily schedule. I like the large and colorful pockets
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great deal and quality. Can't wait to put it up in my classroom in the fall.
customer_reviews.author: Jeni

customer_reviews.title: Great classroom resource!
customer_reviews.text: Nice quality! First one came damaged from shipping and another one was sent quickly. I love the pocket at the bottom!
customer_reviews.author: JR

customer_reviews.title: Durable hanging case, not too heavy
customer_reviews.text: This product is easy for young children to read and understand as it shows the time for each change. The cards are not laminated.
customer_reviews.author: mswan

customer_reviews.title: Definitely what I needed
customer_reviews.text: Easy to hang and perfect size for my bulletin board and schedule.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Just not what I thought it would be.
customer_reviews.text: I put this up in my classroom. It is not as large as I envisioned. It's a little hard for the kids to see. It's find quality, just too small.
customer_reviews.author: Suellen Goebel

customer_reviews.title: We use this in the dug out for tee ball ...
customer_reviews.text: We use this in the dug out for tee ball. It helps to keep the batting order. Each child knows when it will be their turn.
customer_reviews.author: Grace

customer_reviews.title: I like it because it a very nice size easy to see it and that you can hang it.
customer_reviews.text: I chose this for my daughter who was very excited it helps her to be more independent without me telling her what to do all the time
customer_reviews.author: Grateful

product_meta.title: Daily Schedule Pocket Chart， Class Schedule with 26 Cards, 13+1 Pockets. 13 Colored + 13 Blank Double-Sided Reusable Cards, Easy Over-Door Mountings Included. (13” x 36”)
product_meta.description:
Color:Blue
SPRITE GRU Schedule Pocket Chart is a smart tool to help get everyday activities organized. Perfect for classroom and class using, strengthening early childhood organizations and institutions

Compact Pack enables immediate scheduling，13X subject pockets + 1X tool pocket, 26 pre-cut subject cards, 2 mounting hooks. Meet all your needs. 

Upgraded 13+1 pockets schedule chart measures 13” X36”.With 13X subject pockets measures 12.4” X 2” keep all cards in line and 1X tool pocket measures 12.4” X 4” takes care your office accessories. 

26 double-sided subject cards, 13X colored and 13X blank, pre-cut, dry erasable and Eco-Friendly. 

2X “Over door” mounting hooks, no need hammering, hook the chart and put it over the door, all set. 

WARM TIP: 

Please use only water-based markers due to the physical attributes of the ink, with which you can easily erase with a damp cloth or wipes . A REGULAR OIL-BASED MARKERS WILL NOT BE ERASED ! 




NOTICE: The "SPRITE GRU" seller is the only authorized seller, we do not sell wholesale so there should be NO other sellers;
Any other sellers are illegally selling their own products using our registered Trademarked company name. In this listing, 
purchasing from any seller other than "SPRITE GRU" will result in a potentially faulty product that may be unsafe and cause 
injury. Please be sure to purchase this product from the "SPRITE GRU" seller to avoid any problems with your product and to 
ensure both your safety and satisfaction. Manufacturer's warranty included only when purchased from SPRITE GRU
feature_bullets: Smart Design: 13+1 Pockets, 13 X-large pockets for regular Schedule Cards, 1 bottom tool pocket for cards not in use and stationery like markers, scissor etc. Save desktop space and being organized.13” x 36”

Deluxe 26 Scheduling Cards: 13 delightful double-sided subject cards plus 13 blank cards. Made from premium card board with dry erase film,easy wipe off and reusable. Meet all your free-will scheduling needs and eco-friendly
Mountings Ready: Comes with 2 stylish “over-door” hangers, hook the hanger to chart grommets then put it over the door. DONE!!!
Enhanced Pocket: Full-size pocket film, ensure stable placement of subject cards. Pre-cut cards are ready to use
Ideal For:Classroom and home using, scheduling and keepin order, reinforce sense of time of kids and preschool
